TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit StrongNameMembershipCondition extends System.Object implements class System.Security.ISecurityEncodable, class System.Security.ISecurityPolicyEncodable, class System.Security.Policy.IMembershipCondition
Public NotInheritable Class StrongNameMembershipCondition Implements IMembershipCondition
type StrongNameMembershipCondition = class interface IMembershipCondition interface ISecurityEncodable interface ISecurityPolicyEncodable

summary.span: 藉由測試組件的強式名稱 (Strong Name)，判斷組件是否屬於程式碼群組。

span.span: Determines whether an assembly belongs to a code group by testing its strong name.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 強式名稱是適合用來指定程式碼組件提供一組豐富的功能強大的權限。Strong names are well suited to specifying code assemblies to which you give a rich set of powerful permissions. 由於以密碼編譯方式驗證強式名稱，攻擊者就無法模擬合法的組件，並使用其權限。Since strong names are cryptographically verified, attackers cannot impersonate rightful assemblies and use their permissions.

The version number of the strong name.

summary.span: 使用判斷成員資格的強式名稱公開金鑰 Blob、名稱和版本號碼，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the strong name public key blob, name, and version number that determine membership.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 強式名稱是適合用來指定程式碼組件提供一組豐富的功能強大的權限。Strong names are well suited to specifying code assemblies to which you give a rich set of powerful permissions. 由於以密碼編譯方式驗證強式名稱，攻擊者就無法模擬合法的組件，並使用其權限。Since strong names are cryptographically verified, attackers cannot impersonate rightful assemblies and use their permissions. `name`和`version`參數是選擇性的。The `name` and `version` parameters are optional. 比方說，您可以建立，以檢查並(而非) 藉由傳遞`null`到`version`參數。For example, you can create a that checks for and (but not ) by passing `null` into the `version` parameter. 如果`name`為空字串 ("")、就會擲回。If `name` is an empty string (""), an is thrown.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Blob 是唯一指定的軟體發行者公開金鑰密碼編譯資訊。A blob is cryptographic information that uniquely specifies the public key of the software publisher. Blob 與不同的憑證 blob 僅有的公開金鑰; 的相關資訊憑證也會包含具有索引鍵，會將持有者名稱關聯的資訊，以及驗證憑證的資訊。Blobs differ from certificates in that the blob only has information about the public key; the certificate also includes information that associates a name of the holder with the key, as well as information to verify the certificate.
